site.title: Frederick Talks - AI Design Systems & UX Growth Expert
site.description: Design studio founder specializing in AI design systems and UX growth strategies. Available for team sessions, workshops, and talks on practical design that delivers results.

intro.text1: Frederick talks design through a technical, commercial, and practical lens.

text2.content: He's a {link}. He works with product teams to build critical, AI-driven design systems.

intro.text3: He's not into theory. He's into software design that works, scales, and sells.

availability.text: Available for talks and sessions globally

talks.title: AI design systems playbook
talks.description: A hands-on session sharing our process for building and scaling design systems without developers. using MCP, LLMs, and AI.

actions.primary: Bring me in for a team session

modal.title: AI design systems playbook
modal.description: Great for internal teams or bigger crowds of technical product folks.

subtitle.tooltip: Next step is just figuring out the details.

talks.title: How better UX drives growth
talks.description: A talk on why UX is still misunderstood, the costly mistakes we see, and what happens when you actually listen to users.
